class.name: BulletAttachment2D
class.brief_description: Provides the functionality of bullets being able to carry particles or other nodes as they move.

method.name: on_bullet_disable
method.description: Executed when the attachment is disabled before it goes to the object pool. You should provide disable logic - attachment gets invisible/disables specific functionality or children etc...

method.name: on_bullet_enable
method.description: Executed when the attachment is enabled again from the object pool. You should provide activation logic - attachment gets visible/enabled etc..

method.name: on_bullet_spawn
method.description:
Executed before the attachment gets added to the scene tree.
Warning: The [BulletAttachment2D] is not yet in the scene tree when this method is executed.

method.name: on_spawn_in_pool
method.description:
Ensure the attachment is in disabled state (example: attachment should be invisible when you are populating the object pool... in the same state as in the [method on_bullet_disable] function).
Warning: The [BulletAttachment2D] is not yet in the scene tree when this method is executed, so don't call functions that depend on already configured children etc.. instead use [code]_ready[/code]. Just save state specific logic in variables and then later in [code]_ready[/code] handle that.
